title: Game Crash
body:
Client froze and crashed, and when i relogged, "server error game disbanded" ect. followed by a que wait timer. 

Nailed it.

replies.body: Server maintenance was occurring during that time for the new patch.  Bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay updated on scheduled maintenance or any downtime.  Hope that helps ease any concerns!
Has the idea of turning off leaver bust and que times during server issues that can result in players DC been tossed around?
game crashes during in the loading screen .. and fails to reconnect. now am in a 20 min leave buster
